channel.title: NPR Programs: All Things Considered
channel.description: All Things Considered hosts Ailsa Chang, Mary Louise Kelly, Juana Summers and Scott Detrow present the program's trademark mix of news, interviews, commentaries, reviews, and offbeat features 7 days a week.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Recruiting companies are starting to hold job interviews using AI
item.description: Companies have begun using AI to interview potential employees, and a new study shows a number of job candidates may prefer being interviewed by AI.
item.content:encoded: Companies have begun using AI to interview potential employees, and a new study shows a number of job candidates may prefer being interviewed by AI.
item.dc:creator: Wailin Wong

item.title: New licensing deal highlights the growing trend of media giants embracing AI
item.description: The AI entertainment landscape is starting to shift, with deals springing up between formerly adversarial AI companies and entertainment corporations, especially in the music space.
item.content:encoded: The AI entertainment landscape is starting to shift, with deals springing up between formerly adversarial AI companies and entertainment corporations, especially in the music space.
item.dc:creator: Chloe Veltman

item.title: James Watson, who co-discovered the structure of DNA, has died at age 97
item.description: James Watson, who co-discovered the structure of DNA has died at age 97. He was a scientific superstar until he made racist remarks that made him an outcast.
item.content:encoded:
James Watson, who co-discovered the structure of DNA has died at age 97. He was a scientific superstar until he made racist remarks that made him an outcast.

(Image credit: J. Conrad Williams, Jr./Newsday)
item.dc:creator: Nell Greenfieldboyce

item.title: What to know about the FAA's air traffic reductions
item.description: Airlines are canceling hundreds of flights to comply with the FAA's order. But there are still questions about the plan, which the agency says will keep the skies safe during the government shutdown.
item.content:encoded: Airlines are canceling hundreds of flights to comply with the FAA's order. But there are still questions about the plan, which the agency says will keep the skies safe during the government shutdown.
item.dc:creator: Joel Rose

item.title: Flight cancellations begin at certain airports
item.description: There were long lines at Logan Airport this morning as passengers queued up for help. The airlines have begun canceling flights to comply with a federal order related to the government shutdown.
item.content:encoded: There were long lines at Logan Airport this morning as passengers queued up for help. The airlines have begun canceling flights to comply with a federal order related to the government shutdown.
item.dc:creator: Jeremy Siegel

item.title: SNAP benefits have been mired in politics even before the government shutdown
item.description: The Trump administration is appealing a court order to fully fund SNAP benefits this month. The federal food aid program has been a political target for Republicans.
item.content:encoded: The Trump administration is appealing a court order to fully fund SNAP benefits this month. The federal food aid program has been a political target for Republicans.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Fowler

item.title: Democrats had big wins in elections this week. Where do the two parties go from here?
item.description: The elections were voters' chance to weigh in a year after President Trump's election. Now Republicans and Democrats are reflecting on where they are and what they need to do to win in the future.
item.content:encoded: The elections were voters' chance to weigh in a year after President Trump's election. Now Republicans and Democrats are reflecting on where they are and what they need to do to win in the future.
item.dc:creator: Tamara Keith

item.title: The new film 'Train Dreams' is almost unbearably beautiful
item.description: Clint Bentley's intimate historical drama, Train Dreams, is set in the age of the steam locomotive and westward expansion, and centers on a logger in the Pacific Northwest.
item.content:encoded: Clint Bentley's intimate historical drama, Train Dreams, is set in the age of the steam locomotive and westward expansion, and centers on a logger in the Pacific Northwest.
item.dc:creator: Bob Mondello

item.title: Woodpeckers and tennis players share similarities when preparing to strike
item.description: Scientists have investigated how woodpeckers use their muscles and their breathing to prepare to strike wood -- and they liken it to the way tennis players prepare to smack a ball.
item.content:encoded: Scientists have investigated how woodpeckers use their muscles and their breathing to prepare to strike wood -- and they liken it to the way tennis players prepare to smack a ball.
item.dc:creator: Christopher Intagliata

item.title: Rosalía's new album is her most impressive project yet
item.description: Global pop star Rosalía is back with a new album Friday. Featuring songs in 13 languages, it's the Spanish star's most impressive project yet.
item.content:encoded: Global pop star Rosalía is back with a new album Friday. Featuring songs in 13 languages, it's the Spanish star's most impressive project yet.
item.dc:creator: Stephen Thompson
